General.Name: MM Forgings Limited
General.Description: M M Forgings Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and sells steel forgings for passenger cars, commercial vehicles, off highway, agricultural, and high-pressure valves in India. The company offers closed die forgings, such as axle beams, steering knuckles, crankshafts, axle spindles, gear blanks, sockets, front hubs, ball studs, cross, and differential spiders. It is also involved in the exporting activities. The company was formerly known as The Madras Motors Ltd and changed its name to M M Forgings Limited in 1993. M M Forgings Limited was founded in 1945 and is based in Chennai, India.
